title: ZeroStopBits Announces Launch of Redesigned Web Site
text:
ZeroStopBits Announces Launch of Redesigned Web Site
Los Angeles, CA, August 31, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Today ZeroStopBits announced the launch of their redesigned site. The new site boasts sleek and responsive full-width layouts, and a more streamlined approach to delivering relevant content. The facelift is long overdue, and brings with it a refreshingly clear understanding of what services the company offers.
The updated Managed Web Hosting page delivers, detailing the many features and perks that come packaged with their offering. Items easily missed previously are pronounced and center page.
A pleasant surprise is the addition of their new IT Solutions page, which is something the company has been doing for 8 years, serving the greater Los Angeles County area, and are only now releasing this information to the public.
Along with the upgrade to the sites overall look and feel, the navigation menu has been overhauled, clearly labeling the many services offered into two categories; Office, and Datacenter.
Sources say that more is on the way, including a hinted VPS Server (virtual private server) product offering, as well as talk of a fully fledged affiliates program.
